This model predicted 'staff' (community nurse time, care assistant time, palliative care specialists) and 'stuff' (medicine bundles, syringe pumps) required to meet resources for end of life care.  

<https://bmjopen.bmj.com/content/11/5/e043795.full?ijkey=eru0iTTZCABzfpF&keytype=ref>
